website_summaries.verdict: Despite some quality control issues, this 4-piece set is ideal for consumers who prefer martini glasses with a design that is a little bit out of the ordinary.
pros: Attractive Z-shaped stems set these martini glasses apart from the pack, and give them a  contemporary look that fits nicely with other decor
cons: Reports of consumers expecting colored stems – they are clear

customer_reviews.title: Item was defective
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a Christmas gift and received on 12/22. 3 of the glasses were fine but the one pictured the rim was defective and warped looking. It's too late to reorder now for Christmas. I have requested a refund unfortunately. The 3 glasses that were correct were very nice, but I feel some type of quality inspection would have been completed before shipping. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glasses!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This glasses are just amazing!! I'm in love with them! They look beautiful and they don't seem to be very fragile. I don't use dishwasher but they seem to be strong to go in the dishwasher. They came in a box with no much of protection but gladly they came intact! I am into drinks lately, so I bought them to experiment this new phase and I am very happy!! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Thaís Knights

customer_reviews.title: Classy and fun looking
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of these years ago and they've held up well and still look cool. The one's I've replaced met their end though no fault of there own. I have them hanging over a counter and two fell to their death when some workers I hired to replace a floor upstairs pounded so hard that they were shook loose. Others met their end due to my ability to break anything that's nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Rev

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Yet Sturdy Glasses
customer_reviews.text: After many trials i can say, without any hesitation, these glasses work! Regardless of what sort of Manhattan, Martini or Negroni I try the glasses continue to work. My research has been exhaustive! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: kunzang brown

customer_reviews.title: Love these unique glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I needed new martini glasses, but with kids and animals in the house, I didn't want anything too expensive that would inevitably get knocked over and break. On the other hand, I still wanted to have something nice to serve my personalized martini's in for adult guests. These are perfect. The unique shape of the stem make them look fancy, but at this price point, if my 90 lb dog's tail knocks it off a coffee table, I'm not concerned. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Looks classy but is not fragile.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for all martinis! The stem has pizazz and is sturdy, not delicate. No worries about breaking the stem off unless of course you drop the glass on the floor. Received great compliments. The price is extremely reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Calex

customer_reviews.title: NICE ....
customer_reviews.text: Good weight and glass, stem, and base is not fragile looking. There is no box in a box. The outside shipping box is the only container the glasses come in. There are dividers in the box.
customer_reviews.author: sinead

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Glasses are the right size, thick enough that they won't break in the dishwasher but not clunky.
customer_reviews.author: P.J.

customer_reviews.title: These work as described.  Now I'm hammered.
customer_reviews.text: I love these cocktail glasses (I was pleasantly surprised to find they work with drinks other than martinis!) They feel good in the hand as well, not too heavy or light. I'm having trouble holding all four at the same time, though. I always get several cocktails at the start of the party and then hide them around the room (you never know when the hostess is going to cut you off.) Especially after "the incident."
customer_reviews.author: Libertarianne

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good size, good price
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy glasses that hold a good amount (neither too much nor too little) at a price that won't make you too upset when someone breaks one. Plus, I suppose they have a kind of happy, good-vibes shape :)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality. Returned.
customer_reviews.text: This is the kind of product that make you question the veracity of Amazon reviews. One look at these glasses and they went right back in the box to be returned. They look cheaply made. The glass is thick and the opposite of elegant. The finish is inconsistent between glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Nikhil Kapur

customer_reviews.title: Consistent Product Defect
customer_reviews.text: The glasses look nice and sexy, except one of them comes with a defect (see pictured). I was thinking if I should return it, but saw another reviewer complaining about the same thing. I figured, every box has that one defective glass, so I’ll just put it at the back and hope I won’t need to serve 4 martinis at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Jill M

customer_reviews.title: Wife loved these
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my wife. She loves them. The little crooked stem actually cradles your fingers making it moor stable and easier to hold. . . who knew?
customer_reviews.author: IBgready

customer_reviews.title: Solid and cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought something similar at a “dollar only “ store and they tipped over and broke easily. These are sturdy and just as cute!! Worth the money (which is negligible) and no glass shards and wasted gin.
customer_reviews.author: Gail A. Call

customer_reviews.title: Minor imperfections
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty much just as they look but there are some minor imperfections in each one. Not that big of a deal but if you’re going to gift these to someone be aware they they aren’t perfectly blown glass.
customer_reviews.author: Groovnick

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy glasses
customer_reviews.text: Very hefty, sturdy feel with a quirky "Z" stem. Gets lots of compliments. Not too afraid to use these and fear they may get chipped. Dishwasher safe and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Peterdragon

customer_reviews.title: Just Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are just too cute ... drinking a Manhattan in my new glass right now. Love it. All 4 arrived in perfect shape. Mmmm.
customer_reviews.author: D. Van Camp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are decent sized martini glasses, so pour with caution! They're really well-made. The glass is considerably thicker than the Libby Midtown Martini Glass, which makes me think they'll hold up quite well. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: From DetroitTop Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: Fancy Nancy
customer_reviews.text: Really like the style of these cocktail glasses. My 7 yr old broke one glass and I was sad, so I order a new set which was used but looked new, no marks or scratches which I was happy with. Saved a little bit of money and they look amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Celia Moreira

customer_reviews.title: My guests loved them!
customer_reviews.text: My first martini glasses and I decided I wanted something festive rather than traditional. My guests loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute. Just like in the picture. Totally worth the money, very good value. We bought for a Christmas Eve get together and they worked very well everyone liked the fun stem
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Thought the glasses would be plastic. I’m clumsy around glassware but non the less, I love it and it is VERY sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Rivers-James

customer_reviews.title: Glasses are as expected
customer_reviews.text: I had got this as a Christmas gift for a friend of mine and although the glasses were as they're pictured, I was a tad disappointed how they arrived (they came in a shipping box only, not in a product box and were dusty so I had to clean them before gifting them).
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because a neighbor had them. They are cute and whimsical and are just the right size. Not overly large where you feel as though you could spill it easily.
customer_reviews.author: WJMedcalf

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These are really jazzy and hold a good size martini. Arrived in great condition. Happy I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: H. Parks

customer_reviews.title: Martini glasses
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift and he loved them. I do think they were a tiny bit pricey for what you got but still very nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love them
customer_reviews.text: They arrived quickly, and packaged very good for glassware. We ordered two sets due to entertaining at our home with friends. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Grimes

customer_reviews.title: All good
customer_reviews.text: Cool looking glasses. First box had a cracked one. They quickly sent a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jake M

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Would buy it again, A+ These are beautiful and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and weight of the martini glasses. Very sturdy and well designed. I will order a second set after seeing this set of 4. Package also arrived quick and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses. I bought for my personal bar. They came in a nondescript cardboard box clearly labeled so not best boxing for gifting. I entertain a lot and have had multiple compliments on the glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I've had these in my bar for months and they are durable and very nice Martini glasses. Glad I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Grace

customer_reviews.title: bored of straight stems?
customer_reviews.text: i use these for all liquids. lighter fluid, ketchup. very versatile. They have the extra swag that says we hold liquid but our stems are not straight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift and were a big hit for my friend's birthday. Used all the time too. Washes nicely as well.
customer_reviews.author: susan styles

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: It was think glass so that is nice. The stems are unique, everyone I’ve made a drink for has loved them. Very cute product- I would gift it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Dirty Martinis
customer_reviews.text: This are very nice glasses, they were a gift, my friend really liked them.
customer_reviews.author: darla

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice glasses. They are easy to hold and look nice. I put them in dishwasher and it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: R. Grasshoff

customer_reviews.title: One of the bases is wobbly
customer_reviews.text: One of the 4 glasses has a wobbly base, like it was not checked correctly when they were made. I needed all 4 for a party, so im keeping them, but would suggest better quality control.
customer_reviews.author: FirePhotoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Cool Design
customer_reviews.text: They are sturdy and solid. A good value and unique.
customer_reviews.author: TAN

customer_reviews.title: Like but break easy
customer_reviews.text: They look great and hold a lot and not as easy as other martini glasses to spill. I like to chill my glasses down in the freezer and perhaps this is not the best idea because I have broken 3 of them so far or maybe they have bubbles in the glass not sure.
customer_reviews.author: LisaF

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Thick good quality. They look nice displayed on the bar too
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, easy to hold and great price
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these glasses and the price is great. Love the stem design and I hope they are durable too, I have had it for few weeks only.
customer_reviews.author: NMT

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cosmo Glass
customer_reviews.text: Great Cosmo glass. Like that it has s lite character to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Love! I got these for my husband and he loves them and they are very thick so hard to break
customer_reviews.author: Abbi124

customer_reviews.title: Thicker and sturdier
customer_reviews.text: These are thicker and sturdier than an original martini glass! Amazing buy and I get complements on the stem!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Mom for mother’s day- she absolutely loved them! Perfect for a gift! They are made of thick handmade glass. Much more sturdy than your average martini glass.
customer_reviews.author: Staci Webster

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!!!
customer_reviews.text: I broke one of my four so ordered four new ones. Love the style and weight. Get many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela K. Ivsan

customer_reviews.title: Works great, pretty and well made
customer_reviews.text: I put it in the freezer a few minutes prior to putting my beverage of choice in the glass. Works great, pretty and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Very substantial glasses. I love the zigzag stems too
customer_reviews.author: S. Taffet

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: It's was great value for $$ smaller than I thought but will make it work. Happy with my purchase can't wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: love these glasses
customer_reviews.text: perfect for use. Quality product love the stem. Very stable
customer_reviews.author: Catherine M. Westcott

customer_reviews.title: Classy and retro style
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the quality and how nice these glasses are. Very sturdy, unlike thin-stemmed martini glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Odalys E. Soto

customer_reviews.title: Not very impressive
customer_reviews.text: Looks like reasonably durable glass. One piece has some problem with the base (it stands, but, somewhat wobbly). The quality of the glass is not very good---should have ordered a Mikasa product or something.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Martini glasses
customer_reviews.text: These work really well. I was surprised how well they are made. They are glass and are nice and heavy. Feel good in the hand, etc... Would buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Harsany

customer_reviews.title: Finally a nicely weighted martini glass
customer_reviews.text: Very nice martini glasses. Most importantly they are sturdy and have some weight to them. I’d recommend them highly
customer_reviews.author: Robin Key

customer_reviews.title: Great Martini  glasses
customer_reviews.text: The Martini glasses look great. They have classy style to them. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: John Whelan

customer_reviews.title: Great producr
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them. He loves the size and look to them. He can’t wait to make some drinks
customer_reviews.author: Megan kasperek

customer_reviews.title: Loved them so much I bought another set
customer_reviews.text: I had a set of these and broke them all over time. Loved them so much I bought another set! Makes a 3 shot martini :-D
customer_reviews.author: J. Gerber

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant
customer_reviews.text: They where very pretty and a lot better than I expected ordered 2 sets for a xmas present I might just keep one set for my self
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughters boyfriends birthday and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They're great quality and hold a good-sized martini.
customer_reviews.author: Andie511

customer_reviews.title: Everyone love the shape.
customer_reviews.text: Because of the shape and design, they just have to smile. Because i'm Martini lover ( deep-dish olive pie), I knew I had to have them!
customer_reviews.author: Blaine Miller

customer_reviews.title: These were beautiful. I bought them to glitter and they worked
customer_reviews.text: These were beautiful. I bought them to glitter and they worked amazing
customer_reviews.author: Lee Anne Martes

customer_reviews.title: Beware of quality
customer_reviews.text: One of the glasses had a straight stem... not worth the cost to return
customer_reviews.author: Artco3535

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about these glasses. My husband drinks martinis and he loves these glasses
customer_reviews.author: Angela MacPike

customer_reviews.title: Great design!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase. They have been a big hit with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Pearce

customer_reviews.title: The first martini glasses I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetic design, easy to hold, and holds a fair amount of liquid 😉
customer_reviews.author: lovebug

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glasses in perfect condition and shipped to me very fast! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Capacity is not as advertised and am returning
customer_reviews.text: This product was advertised as holding 9.25 ounces. It barely hold 8 ounces. Returning!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful martini glassware
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stem shape and thick glassware that could be expected to last long.
customer_reviews.author: JCG

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are as advertised. Good quality and quite sturdy. The stem shape is nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect.for entertaining. They are a real value but look expensive.
customer_reviews.author: kristine Ligammari

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are just as described. Nice and sturdy. Great price. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Well priced martini  glasses that last
customer_reviews.text: The price was great . I keep these in my freezer and they are perfect .
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: i like them cute perfect size not too big or too small
customer_reviews.author: laura morales

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: moderately thick well constructed glass. not fragile and well balanced
customer_reviews.author: craig de

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses, so cute but also very well made
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift for my boyfriend...so he could make me martinis
customer_reviews.text: OK ok...gifting this was selfish on my part. My bf just bought bought and he has a wet bar in the basement. He used to be a bartender back in the day and he wanted to stock the bar with nice glasses. He doesn't drink martinis....but I do. I gifted him this set of glasses and said "we can use these when we have company and be all fancy...". I may have also gifted him blue cheese stuffed olives and a bottle of Ketel One vodka. That Friday night I lounged on his couch, drinking a martini, watching Netflix. Best gift idea ; ).
customer_reviews.author: SarahMonroe

customer_reviews.title: More fragile than crystal-if breaks, spreads like water across floor
customer_reviews.text: These things are more fragile than crystal. Upon breaking the first one, as it spread across 12 square feet of my floor, I thought it was just a fluke. HOWEVER, when the second one broke, after brushing against it, and the minuscule, almost microscopic pieces shattered all the way across my 20' x 20' kitchen floor, I'd had it. I had to sweep it up with a small dustpan set, followed by a thorough vacuum of the entire floor. I was afraid a family member or pet would get glass splinters otherwise. I threw the other 2 in the trash as it's not worth doing this again.
customer_reviews.author: yetanotherreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use with mashed potatoes. I saw them use martini glasses to serve mashed potatoes on a show once and loved the idea. I wanted cooler glasses so I got the z-stem ones. You just scoop some mashed potatoes in each instead of putting it in a bowl on the table. It's a lot prettier and classy. Of course you can use them for individual desserts also.
customer_reviews.author: akas

customer_reviews.title: Nice, multipurpose
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are perfect for sorbet and other desserts. They'll be nifty for witch's heart cocktails on Halloween and of course martinis and old fashioneds anytime. I like the z stem because I'm a little twisted myself. 😉 The price means if one gets broken, my heart will remain intact, they'll be used more for everyday saving my good crystal for entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: AZMA

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy while still being pretty
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy while still being pretty. Good for RV trips. And the price couldn't be better!!!! The size is perfect and I like a good size martini :-) I've ordered these a couple times, for my home and for my RV.... IF you should get a chipped, broken, or defective glass I can tell you they're very good about replacing it. Although with five boxes ordered I only had one that was chipped.
customer_reviews.author: BEVERLY HOWELL

customer_reviews.title: A Martin gauged
customer_reviews.text: I really like them. Unfortunately I had no Martine mix handy. To me brandy was the next best thing. To hold was a measure to how many Martine you have had and you should stop when you could not hold on to you glass. A nice glass and I like them on a closings note all 4 was in good shape. On the arrival
customer_reviews.author: Wayland

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: Nice glasses and good looking stem. Easy to hold and nice design. We even use them for some desserts. Worth its value. We get nice comments about how nice they look.
customer_reviews.author: Harry A.

customer_reviews.title: Very cool looking!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the unusual shape and they were a big hit at a recent party. I might have to get another set since the "winos" wanted to drink from them as well! They wash well and are sturdy enough to not have to worry about someone breaking the stem easily after a few too many "tinis". Decent price, too.
customer_reviews.author: JAN

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses.
customer_reviews.text: They were a huge hit at my latest party where chocolate martinis were served. Drinks may be good, but are much better if served in the proper glass. Don't hesitate to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: I really like the crooked stem
customer_reviews.text: One of the glasses has a flaw. It appears that where it was completed there is a "Bump" but it made it sharp. The others are attractive and you can't really argue about Libbey. They have been making glassware for a long time. I really like the crooked stem. Makes it stand out
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mc

customer_reviews.title: Cute glasses
customer_reviews.text: Cute martini glasses. The zig zag stems make them real comfortable to hold. Not sure how durable they will be because I'm a klutz and broke one in the sink the day I got them. But for most people I think they will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Casey's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Unique Martini Glasses
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are very unique. The package arrived as estimated., it was packed well with no broken glass. The glasses are just as described by the seller. I am very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: gtalitha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: My family and I love these glasses. I wanted to make an occasional cosmopolitan and I needed cute glasses. These are great.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Really great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Loved these glasses so much! Only thing is one cracked very easily however I bought 16 for a party so I still have 15 for next time, no big deal. These glasses were very fun, everyone loved them and they hold a good amount of alcohol.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Rios

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and easy to hold in your hand. Dishwasher safe and sturdy. Will order more to make a full set.
customer_reviews.author: B. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great martini glasses
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably priceed and sturdy. These are nice replacements for the ones we've broken over the years. Like the design.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Very nice glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are heavier than I thought they would be - which I like. These are not the thin / delicate type of glass. I just tried them out and they are very good.
customer_reviews.author: William Morrill

customer_reviews.title: Great looking martini glasses, easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: Love these zigzag stem martini glasses. Unique look, easy to hold. Not to thin, not to thick, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy K.

customer_reviews.title: Fun & great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses! Fun design that just makes the drink more interesting to serve!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Wear

customer_reviews.title: These glasses are beautiful in person
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses but I could not keep these couldn't afford at the time
customer_reviews.author: LA Happy

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Such a good price for a set of martini glasses. It looks very nice and the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey N

customer_reviews.title: My martini glasses are tinted!! Red!
customer_reviews.text: Hey! For those one star reviews – my martini glasses are tinted! Check out the picture. They even have sugar on the rim!!
customer_reviews.author: G. Mary K

customer_reviews.title: Feel sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These arrived exactly as described, have great weight and feel very sturdy and durable in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa

product_meta.title: Libbey Z-Stem Martini Glasses, Set of 4
product_meta.description: Size:9 oz| Color:ClearGive your Friday, Saturday - or even Tuesday - night an extra-quirky twist. These fun, interesting martini glasses are designed with a cool curly stem to match your favorite citrus twist - whether you're into lemon, orange or something even more surprising. Flaming grapefruit garnishes, anyone?
feature_bullets: Interesting twisted stem shape keeps guests guessing - orange peel or no!
Matching set makes a great gift for hosts, bachelorette parties and housewarmings alike
Durable and dishwasher safe for quick, easy cleanup; to help preserve your products, please refer to the Libbey website for care and handling instructions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars433 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
